sense.name: 能力, capability, ability (often refers to humans’ innate potential for growth, development, or accomplishment) 能力, 才能(常指人类天赋的，如生长、发展或成功的潜力)
sense.commentary: The mental or physical power needed to do something.
sense.examples:
一个能力极强的学生. A student of great capabilities
粘附能力 adhesive ability
一个人有这样的能力一定能做好。 Someone with that kind of ability will do well.

sense.name: skills, 能力
sense.examples:
语言能力 language skills
写作能力 writing skills
学校往往不能给学生提供所需的能力和技术。 Schools often do not provide students with marketable skills.

sense.name: power, 能力
sense.examples:
竟争能力 competitive power
生产能力 productive power
购买能力 purchasing power
